name: Dungeon Souls (itch)
description:
Dungeon Souls is a 2D topdown hack n' slash/RPG game with some roguelike elements. Each level is randomly-generated so each playthrough is unique and will never be the same.





As you enter, you must search and activate all the marks placed everywhere which will unlock your way out of the dungeon. In the run, you will be encountering a lot of different traps that may came out of nowhere, and different enemies with unique abilities.





There are also a lot of items that can make your journey a lot easier and manageable.





Some of the elements in Dungeon Souls is inspired by Risk of Rain, Nuclear Throne, Overture, BitVenture and Shoot First.



FEATURES

  • 6 Playable characters with unique abilities
  • Upgradable stats/attributes
  • 2 different environment with randomly generated levels, and bosses!
  • 40+ unique passive or orbiting items
  • Lot of different enemies with unique abilities
